objects.description: [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0010) infects OB1 so that its malicious code sequence is executed at the start of a cycle. It also infects OB35. OB35 acts as a watchdog, and on certain conditions, it can stop the execution of OB1. (Citation: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011)

external_references.source_name: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011
external_references.description: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien 2011, February W32.Stuxnet Dossier (Version 1.4) Retrieved. 2017/09/22
